title: MisTaken
description: Previously published in the anthology, Hot Alphas, MisTaken is now available as a standalone novella!Jaylene Kim is an independent woman who's never had a man tell her what to do. But when her smolderingly hot and mysterious neighbor introduces her to a few new rules in the bedroom, Jaylene must learn to relinquish control...if she is to run wild with passion...
author: Laurelin Paige
